The two ladies room together, then fall out when both are attracted to the same man - off-Broadway producer John Pierce (John Heard)(n)

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent')(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her(n)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: Psychological drama from director Atom Egoyan ("The Sweet Hereafter") stars Elaine Cassidy as Felicia, an Irish girl who follows her boyfriend to England when she discovers she's pregnant with his child. Unsure of his exact whereabouts, Felicia instead comes under the sway of Joseph (Bob Hoskins), a caterer who has a violent secret history with young homeless women just like Felicia. Based on the novel by William Trevor(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas(n)

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: A New York magazine photographer is confined to his apartment after breaking his leg. He passes the time by spying on his neighbors from his window, and suspicious goings-on in one of the apartments lead him to believe that someone has been murdered. (cc)

programme.title: The Trouble with Harry
programme.desc: A peaceful Vermont village is turned upside down when a man's body is discovered in a meadow. While there is no single suspect, everyone in town seems to have an idea who killed the man - and many of them believe they may have done it themselves. (cc)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: After stumbling upon a political-assassination plot while vacationing in Morocco, an American couple's child is kidnapped in an attempt to ensure their silence. (cc)

programme.title: The Wrong Man
programme.desc: A different kind of Alfred Hitchcock film: a fact-based, semi-documentary account of a New York City musician who is falsely accused of an armed robbery and the nightmarish impact it has on him and his family, especially his mentally unstable wife. The idea for the motion picture came when Hitchcock read about the miscarriage of justice in a Life magazine article. (cc)

programme.title: Fonda on Fonda
programme.desc: Jane Fonda hosts a tribute to her father that includes film clips and interviews with family members, Katharine Hepburn, James Stewart and director Sidney Lumet. Also: family photographs and home movies. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Private Screenings
programme.desc: The tables are turned as regular series host Robert Osborne is interviewed by Alec Baldwin. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Bathing Beauty
programme.desc: An Esther Williams aquatic extravaganza about a lovesick songwriter who enrolls in an all-women's college to be near his newlywed wife (Williams), who ditched him shortly after the wedding in order to take a job as a swimming instructor at the school. (cc)

programme.title: Beneath the 12-Mile Reef
programme.desc: A family of traditional Greek sponge divers working the Gulf Coast of Florida get into a feud with a conniving family of WASPy fishermen, who have no problem resorting to violence in order to stake their claim on their fishing grounds

programme.title: Boston Blackie's Rendezvous
programme.desc: Blackie (Chester Morris) risks his life to find a homicidal maniac (Steve Cochran) on the loose. Nina Foch, George E. Stone. Ferraday: Richard Land. Patricia: Adelle Roberts. Mathews: Frank Sully. Martha: Iris Adrian

programme.title: The Lion in Winter
programme.desc: Adaptation of the play about royal-family intrigue in 1183 involving King Henry II, his estranged wife Eleanor of Aquitaine and their three sons who make up the line of succession. (cc)

programme.title: Moonfleet
programme.desc: In 1750s England, an orphaned lad is put in the care of a roguish smuggler who develops a tender side as he begins to entertain affectionate feelings for the boy. And soon he's trying to protect him from the dangers inherent in his illegal activities. (cc)

programme.title: Adventures of Robinson Crusoe
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Daniel Defoe adventure classic follows the exploits of a 17th-century shipwrecked Englishman trying to survive being stranded on a desert island with the help of a faithful companion. As the title character, Dan O'Herlihy was nominated for Best Actor. (cc)

programme.title: The Four Musketeers
programme.desc: A scorned noblewoman seeks to unseat the queen, but the Musketeers scuttle her plans. Undeterred, she uses every weapon at her disposal, including seduction, to guarantee her revenge against the valiant foursome. (cc)

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: An aspiring actress feigns humility and naiveté to connive her way under the wing of a veteran Broadway star. She manipulates those in the star's circle in hopes of cheating her way to the top. Based on the short story "The Wisdom of Eve" by Mary Orr. (cc)

programme.title: The Star
programme.desc: A Hollywood has-been attempts a comeback. (cc)

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
programme.desc: An embittered has-been child actor torments her disabled sister, while scheming to resurrect her own vaudeville career when she was known as the talented "Baby Jane." (cc)

programme.title: Terminal Island
programme.desc: A penal colony is disrupted by women convicts determined to create a free and equal environment. Tom Selleck, Phyllis Davis, Don Marshall, Roger E. Mosley, Ena Hartman, Marta Kristen, Barbara Leigh. Stephanie Rothman directed

programme.title: House of Women
programme.desc: A chronicle of unwholesome conditions in a women's prison, where a pregnant woman is wrongly convicted of armed robbery and sentenced to serve five years, during which the warden becomes attracted to her. (cc)

programme.title: Above Suspicion
programme.desc: Newlywed spies travel to Germany to track down a secret weapon being developed by the Nazis. (cc)

programme.title: Mary of Scotland
programme.desc: John Ford's account of 16th-century court intrigue and politics involving Mary Stuart, Queen of Scotland, and the rivalry with her British cousin, Elizabeth Tudor, for the English throne. (cc)

programme.title: Deadline at Dawn
programme.desc: A sailor on leave is mistakenly charged with murder and has until dawn to prove that he didn't do it. He receives unexpected help from a world-weary dance-hall girl. (cc)

programme.title: Inherit the Wind
programme.desc: Version of the Broadway hit about 1925's Scopes "Monkey Trial" in Tennessee, where high-school teacher John Scopes was arrested for teaching Darwin's theory of evolution in violation of state law. The resulting trial brought together two titans of the legal profession, one "belching platitudes" of creationism and the other championing the evolutionist cause. (cc)

programme.title: The Carey Treatment
programme.desc: A pathologist at a Boston hospital is determined to clear his colleague of a murder charge stemming from a botched abortion, and his investigation uncovers widespread corruption at the facility. (cc)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A classic sitcom that reflected the lives of six twentysomething friends: three men and three women, living in New York. Sometimes touching and often hilarious, it addressed universal themes like falling in---or out of---love, finding a job and dealing with (as well as becoming) parents, and inspired numerous friends-themed knockoffs, none of which conveyed the warmth and humor of the original. A spin-off, `Joey,' featuring Matt LeBlanc's character, was slated to debut in the fall of 2004. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 17)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 18)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 18)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV
